140 meters sock weight yarn i recommend superwash for kid s socks they get filthy and i am not hand washing that samples shown in shibui sock and zitron trekking needles size us 2/2 75 mm double-point needles gauge 7 stitches and 11 row = 1 inch/4 cm notions tapestry needle to weave in ends techniques knitting in the round judy s magic cast on wrap and turn and jeny s surprisingly stretchy bind off if you are unfamiliar with any of these techniques see the tutorials here http //knitty com/issuespring06/featmagiccaston html http //www purlbee com/short-row-tutorial/ http //knitty com/issuefall09/featjssbo php pattern notes here is a basic pattern for toddler socks gotta keep those teeny tootsies warm this pattern is really easy to customize to incorporate color working or pattern stitches the base pattern is written for a single color but you can easily stripe 1 your yarn by switching yarn colors at the completion of a row this is an appropriate pattern for beginners to making socks toe -using judy s magic cast on cast on 8 stitches over 2 needles begin working in the round -knit in the front and back of each stitch 16 stitches -knit 1 round - knit 1 knit in the front and back of the next stitch repeat from to to the end 24 stitches -knit 1 round -knit 1 knit in the front and back of the next stitch knit 8 stitches knit in the front and back of the next stitch knit 2 repeat from to once more knit 1 28 stitches -knit 1 round -knit 1 knit in the front and back of the next stitch knit 10 stitches knit in the front and back of the next stitch knit 2 repeat from to once more knit 1 32 stitches -stop increases here for small size -knit 1 round -knit 1 knit in the front and back of the next stitch knit 12 stitches knit in the front and back of the next stitch knit 2 repeat from to once more knit 1 36 stitches -stop increases here for medium size -knit 1 round -knit 1 knit in the front and back of the next stitch knit 14 stitches knit in the front and back of the next stitch knit 2 repeat from to once more knit 1 40 stitches foot all sizes resume here -work in stockinette stitch knit every round until sock measures 3 ¾ 4 ¾ 5 ½ /9 5 12 14 cm from cast on edge or about 1 ¼ -
